item.title: A Review From an Intern
item.description: A review from an Intern I take great proud of teaching and developing my team members - both professionally and personally - it is the most rewarding experience and joy of being a technical manager. Team development is not not only related to the Junior members of the team, but Seniors as well: there are several dimensions which contributes to career development, being the most proficient coder is not enough, if you can’t lead others by example or fail to clearly communicate ideas to peers and managers.
